item.title: 178 RR - Book Club: Refactoring Ruby with Martin Fowler
item.description: The Rogues introduce new Rogue, Jessica Kerr, and talk with Martin Fowler in another book club episode: Refactoring Ruby.
item.itunes:summary: The Rogues introduce new Rogue, Jessica Kerr, and talk with Martin Fowler in another book club episode: Refactoring Ruby.
